docs.snippet: German inflation jumped to within a whisker of the European Central Bank target in December, hitting the highest level in more than three years and providing the euro zone bank with evidence its loose monetary policy is working....

headline.main: A Love Story and Twins for a Combat Veteran Amputee

docs.snippet: After a judge ruled Monday that Dylann Roof is competent to represent himself, the same jury that last month unanimously found him guilty in the slayings of nine black parishioners at a South Carolina church will return to court to begin contempla...
docs.lead_paragraph: After a judge ruled Monday that Dylann Roof is competent to represent himself, the same jury that last month unanimously found him guilty in the slayings of nine black parishioners at a South Carolina church will return to court to begin contemplating his punishment.

headline.main: Roof Found Competent for Sentencing, Gets Extra Prep Day
headline.print_headline: Roof Found Competent for Sentencing, Gets Extra Prep Day

docs.snippet: The Philippine Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday that it has ordered pharmaceutical giant Sanofi Pasteur Inc. to stop airing television and radio advertisements for its dengue vaccine in violation of a ban on promoting prescription or ethi...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philippine Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday that it has ordered pharmaceutical giant Sanofi Pasteur Inc. to stop airing television and radio advertisements for its dengue vaccine in violation of a ban on promoting prescription or ethical drugs in mass media.

headline.main: Philippine FDA Orders Sanofi to Take Down Dengue Vaccine Ads
headline.print_headline: Philippine FDA Orders Sanofi to Take Down Dengue Vaccine Ads
